hero.title: DEV CRACKS
hero.subtitle: CODE // BREAKER
hero.question: Are you afraid of AI, Automation, and digital transformation?

automation.title: Intelligent Automation
automation.description: Companies that automate their processes reduce execution time by 70% and significantly increase productivity, generating measurable ROI from the first quarter.

ai.title: Applied Artificial Intelligence
ai.description: AI enables more accurate decisions, reducing errors by 85% and optimizing business resources. We transform data into competitive advantage.

agents.title: Orchestrated AI Agents
agents.description: Coordinated agent systems reduce operational costs by up to 60% while improving efficiency. Automation that scales with your business.

cloud.title: Cloud & Enterprise DevOps
cloud.description: Cloud implementations reduce deployment times by 50% and improve scalability. Infrastructure that grows with you.

roi.title: Verified Average ROI
roi.description: Companies that implement our solutions achieve an average return on investment of 300% in the first year. Measurable results, real impact.

services.title: Digital Transformation Services
services.intro: Each service is designed to solve real business problems with measurable results. From strategic consulting to technical implementation, we accompany your digital transformation.

consulting.title: Strategic AI & Automation Consulting
consulting.what: Strategic advice to identify opportunities for AI implementation and automation in your organization.
consulting.problem: Lack of clear vision on where and how to apply AI to maximize ROI. Decisions based on intuition rather than data.
consulting.how: Exhaustive process analysis, identification of high-impact use cases, prioritized implementation roadmap, and ROI projection.
consulting.benefit: Clear strategy with projected ROI, prioritization of initiatives, and executable roadmap from day one.

customDev.title: Custom Solution Development
customDev.what: Custom software, APIs, and data integration designed specifically for your business needs.
customDev.problem: Generic solutions do not adapt to specific needs. Legacy systems limit innovation and scalability.
customDev.how: Modern cloud-native architecture, agile development with proven methodologies, seamless integration with existing systems, and scalability by design.
customDev.benefit: Solutions that scale with the business, seamless integration, and simplified maintenance.

dataMl.title: Data Engineering & ML for Prediction and Optimization
dataMl.what: Robust data pipelines and Machine Learning models for intelligent data-driven decisions.
dataMl.problem: Unexploited data, intuition-based decisions, lack of real-time visibility, and lost optimization opportunities.
dataMl.how: Data ingestion and processing at scale, ML models trained with real data, real-time dashboards, and continuous predictive analysis.
dataMl.benefit: Data-driven decisions, continuous optimization, trend prediction, and operational risk reduction.

legacy.title: Legacy System Integration with Modern Platforms
legacy.what: Modernization of old systems without interrupting operations, connecting the old with the new.
legacy.problem: Legacy systems limit innovation, high maintenance costs, difficulty integrating new technologies, and high operational risk.
legacy.how: APIs as an abstraction layer, hybrid architecture, gradual migration without downtime, and maintenance of critical systems during transition.
legacy.benefit: Innovation without operational risk, reduced maintenance costs, improved scalability, and future-readiness.

automation.title: Business Process Automation
automation.what: Optimization and automation of business processes with customized solutions that transform operations.
automation.problem: Repetitive manual processes, high operational costs, frequent human errors, and prolonged execution times.
automation.how: Process analysis, identification of automation opportunities, implementation of intelligent workflows, and continuous efficiency monitoring.
automation.benefit: Operational cost reduction of 50-70%, elimination of manual errors, increased productivity, and time release for strategic tasks.

agents.title: Orchestrated AI Agents
agents.what: Intelligent systems with multiple AI agents working continuously to solve complex tasks.
agents.problem: Complex tasks require multiple manual steps, coordination between teams is inefficient, and limited scalability of processes.
agents.how: Specialized agent architecture, intelligent task orchestration, agent communication, and continuous system learning.
agents.benefit: Automation of complex flows, operational cost reduction up to 60%, automatic scalability, and autonomous problem resolution.

cloud.title: Cloud & Enterprise DevOps
cloud.what: Scalable cloud architectures and DevOps pipelines to streamline deployment and operation.
cloud.problem: Slow and manual deployments, rigid infrastructure, difficulty scaling, and lack of operational visibility.
cloud.how: Cloud-native architecture, automated CI/CD, infrastructure as code, real-time monitoring and observability.
cloud.benefit: Deployment time reduction by 50%, automatic scalability, greater reliability, and infrastructure cost reduction.

security.title: Security and Code Audit
security.what: We guarantee the robustness and security of your systems with comprehensive audits and best practices.
security.problem: Security vulnerabilities, substandard code, lack of compliance, and undetected security risks.
security.how: Comprehensive code audits, vulnerability analysis, implementation of best security practices, and compliance with standards.
security.benefit: Secure and robust systems, guaranteed compliance, risk reduction, and stakeholder confidence.

products.title: Our Enterprise Products
products.intro: Proven and scalable solutions designed to solve real business problems. Each product is optimized to generate measurable impact from day one.

routeon.name: Routeon Enterprise
routeon.description: SaaS platform for operation, real-time visibility, and logistics optimization of parcel franchise networks.
benefits: Reduction of operational errors through intelligent automation
Real-time visibility of the entire network
results: Positive ROI from the first quarter

devcoach.name: Dev-Coach Pro
devcoach.description: Training itinerary oriented to real projects with expert mentorship to develop software engineering skills (from junior to senior).
results: Reduction of technical gaps in 3-6 months
Time to real impact reduced by 60%
Measurable ROI in hiring and onboarding costs

community.name: DEV Community
community.description: Active developer community with technical resources, events, networking, and access to exclusive content on the latest technologies.

whyUs.title: Why Choose Dev-Cracks?
whyUs.intro: We are not just another software agency or a traditional consultancy. We are a strategic digital transformation partner with deep technical expertise and proven results.

technical.devCracks: Certified experts in applied AI, machine learning and intelligent automation
technical.generic: Superficial knowledge, focus on traditional web development
technical.traditional: Theory without practical implementation, reliance on third parties

speed.devCracks: Agile methodologies, rapid prototyping, MVP in weeks
speed.generic: Slow processes, internal bureaucracy, extended deadlines
speed.traditional: Prolonged analysis, slow implementation, months until results

roi.devCracks: Clear metrics from day 1, average 300% ROI in first year
roi.generic: Vague metrics, difficult to measure real impact
roi.traditional: ROI difficult to quantify, uncertain long-term results

experts.title: Elite Experts
experts.description: Top developers with years of experience in advanced AI and automation technologies.

innovation.title: Constant Innovation
innovation.description: Up to date with the latest trends and methodologies to offer cutting-edge solutions.

quality.title: Impeccable Quality
quality.description: Robust, scalable software with clean and efficient code from day one.

collaboration.title: Transparent Collaboration
collaboration.description: Open communication, agile processes, and working side-by-side with your team.

header.title: Let's Connect! We are here to help you
header.text: Your digital transformation deserves a strategic partner. Let's talk and discover together how we can generate measurable impact in your company.
header.promiseTitle: Guaranteed response in less than 24 hours
header.promiseText: Our team of senior consultants will review your request and contact you directly.

form.name: Full Name
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your project, challenges or specific needs...
form.success: Thank you! A senior consultant will contact you within 24 hours.

caseStudies.title: Use Cases and Proven Results
caseStudies.intro: We transform companies from different industries with AI and automation solutions. These are real examples of measurable impact on business operations.
caseStudies.cta: Want similar results for your company?

logistics.title: Parcel Franchise Network Optimization
logistics.challenge: Franchise network with manual processes, high rate of operational errors and lack of real-time visibility of operations.
logistics.solution: Implementation of Routeon Enterprise with ML for demand forecasting, workflow automation and centralized dashboard.

retail.title: Inventory Optimization with Machine Learning
retail.challenge: Frequent overstock and stockouts, purchase decisions based on intuition and obsolescence losses.
retail.solution: ML demand forecasting system, automatic inventory optimization and proactive replenishment alerts.

financial.title: Regulatory Process Automation
financial.challenge: Manual regulatory processes, prolonged compliance times and high risk of errors in reports.
financial.solution: Intelligent automation of regulatory processes with orchestrated AI agents and automatic compliance validation.

manufacturing.title: Predictive Maintenance
manufacturing.challenge: Reactive maintenance causing unexpected shutdowns, high repair costs and loss of productivity.
manufacturing.solution: ML system for failure prediction, optimized preventive maintenance and reduction of unplanned downtime.

ecommerce.title: AI Personalization and Recommendations
ecommerce.challenge: Low conversion rates, frequent abandoned carts and lack of personalization in customer experience.
ecommerce.solution: ML recommendation system, dynamic content personalization and real-time price optimization.

healthcare.title: Hospital Resource Optimization
healthcare.challenge: Inefficiency in resource allocation, prolonged wait times and difficulty predicting service demand.
healthcare.solution: ML system for demand forecasting, schedule optimization and intelligent allocation of medical resources.
